import styles from './styles.module.scss' import { Layout } from "../../components/layouts" import { useEffect, useState } from 'react' import { IProduct } from '../../global/interfaces' import { RepositoryProduct } from '../../repository/Products' const ProductDetails = () => { const [product, setProduct] = useState() useEffect(() => { window.scrollTo(0, 0) const productId = (window as any).location.pathname.split('/')[2] const product = new RepositoryProduct() product.getById(productId) }, []) return (
